ResearchProjectDef.label: battery invention
ResearchProjectDef.description: Beginning the creation of batteries. Unlock voltaic pile, the very fisrt battery.

ResearchProjectDef.label: improved primary batteries
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advancing knowledge in primary batteries lead to denser and more efficent primary batteries. Unlock Daniell Cell, a low capacity cell.

ResearchProjectDef.label: rechargable battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build lead acid batteries to store your excess power!!

ResearchProjectDef.label: battery scaling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Begin Research in scaling up battery sizes. Build Large varient for more storage with more material efficiency.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advance primary battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research the use of zinc, carbon and manganese in primary batteries.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lithium research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Due to lithium being a very light and abundant metal, it could be used in producing batteries. It comes with lots of challenges though, especially it's high reactivity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nickel research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nickel-based battery is promising. Easy to aquire, easy to produce and store.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medium extra size
ResearchProjectDef.description: The large batteries is too big?, Try this new size : Medium Extra. Can hold as much charge as the Large varient, but only taking 1/2 the space. Of course thermalwise, it is bad.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Modern primary battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build heavy metal (gold, silver) primary batteries. Unlock primary batteries made from silver.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lithium-ion cobalt
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build lithium-ion batteries. This battery is lighter than lead acid, but holds as much as 7 times more charge per volume. Unlock first type of Li-ion : lithium cobalt.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nickel-Iron battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nickel-Iron batteries are cheap, easy to produce and rechargable, hold as much as double the charge of lead acid battery per volume, but is quite heavy..

ResearchProjectDef.label: Large extra size
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build extra varient of the Large size. Double the charge, still 2x2 size. Only apply for some types of batteries

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lithium-metal battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build primary cell : lithium-metal. Atonishing energy density. The most advance primary battery you can get.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lithium Diversity
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build even more types of lithium-ion batteries. Every type is special.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nickel Diversity
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build state-of-the-art Nikel batteries, which destroy older techs in terms of performance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Harzard-proof batteries
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build battery housing that have its own emergency power source, that can heat up the main battery in extreme temperature. These built-in batteries however can only be charged up slowly and it takes up space of the main battery.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Portable batteries
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build portable batteries. They are small and lightweight. Suitable for caravans.
